remarks: Membership of diagonal elements in the structure power base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
statement:
pwsdiagel.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsdiagel.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
pwsdiagel.c $e |- C = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwsdiagel $p |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) /\ A e. B ) -> ( I X. { A } ) e. C ) $.
